alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CHEMUNG...WEST CENTRAL TIOGA AND SOUTH CENTRAL TOMPKINS COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Erin, or 9 miles northeast of Elmira, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Erin, Candor, Spencer, Van Etten, Lockwood, Willseyville, Breesport, South Danby, North Spencer, and West Candor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
